import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { postPokemon, getTypes } from "../actions"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import '../css/form.css' function validate(input) { let errors = {} if(!input.name) { errors.name = "Se requiere un nombre" } else if(!input.type.length < 1 || !input.type.length > 2){ errors.type = "Se rquiere como mínimo 1 tipo y como máximo 2" } return errors; } const CreatePokemon = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const types = useSelector((state) => state.types) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getTypes()) }, [dispatch]) return (
Crea un Pokemón

) } export default CreatePokemon
